name: Il Sole e la Luna 2
description:
Plot IL SOLE E LA LUNA 2

The end of "Il Sole e la Luna" sees our two protagonists Sunny and Moony take two different paths. The first obtains the much coveted place as the Royal Guard, the second decides to reject the King's offer and withdraws from the scene.
Until one year later a new threat looms inside the walls, believed to be impregnable, of the capital of the Kingdom of Town!
Will our heroes be able to discover the mysteries behind this attack?

GAME DESCRIPTION
Il Sole e la Luna 2!
Role Playing Fantasy Game.
Spectacular turn-based battles with unique settings.
Fully explorable world (Open World)!
Level up, Equip the many weapons and armor available, a new system of learning skills and magic, discover all the playable characters, over 50 side quests, defeat and capture all the wanted and lots of other news!
Help Sunny and Moony save the kingdom AGAIN !!
